actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare with amendment (without written report).

official_title: A bill to amend the Service Contract Act of 1965 to provide that all employees, other than bona fide executive, administrative, or professional employees shall be considered to be service employees for purposes of such act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Service Contract Act of 1965 to redefine "service employees" for purposes of Federal service contract labor standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Service Contract Act of 1965 to provide that all employees, other than bona fide executive, administrative, or professional employees shall be considered to be service employees for purposes of such act, and for other purposes.
